mapper.select: select P.PID, P.HRS_HD, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_DATE, count(C.PCID) as RCNT from POST_INFO P left join POST_COMMENT C on P.PID = C.PID where lower(P.TITLE) like lower('%' || #{keyword} || '%') or lower(P.HRS_HD) like lower('%' || #{keyword} || '%') group by P.PID, P.HRS_HD, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_DATE order by P.PID desc

select * from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(POST_INFO pk_board) */ rownum rn, PID, HRS_HD, TITLE, AUTHOR, CREATED_DATE from ( select P.PID, P.HRS_HD, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_DATE, count(C.PCID) as RCNT from POST_INFO P left join POST_COMMENT C on P.PID = C.PID where lower(P.TITLE) like lower('%' || #{keyword} || '%') or lower(P.HRS_HD) like lower('%' || #{keyword} || '%') group by P.PID, P.HRS_HD, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_DATE order by P.CREATED_DATE desc ) where PID > 0 and rownum >0 and rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ) where rn >(#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}

select * from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(POST_INFO pk_board) */ rownum rn, PID, HRS_HD, TITLE, AUTHOR, CREATED_DATE, RCNT from ( select P.PID, P.HRS_HD, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_DATE, count(C.PCID) as RCNT from POST_INFO P left join POST_COMMENT C on P.PID = C.PID group by P.PID, P.HRS_HD, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_DATE order by P.CREATED_DATE desc ) where PID > 0 and rownum >0 and rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ) where rn >(#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from POST_INFO where lower(TITLE) like lower('%' || #{keyword} || '%') or lower(HRS_HD) like lower('%' || #{keyword} || '%')

select P.PID, P.HRS_HD, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_DATE, count(C.PCID) as RCNT from POST_INFO P left join POST_COMMENT C on P.PID = C.PID group by P.PID, P.HRS_HD, P.TITLE, P.AUTHOR, P.CREATED_DATE order by P.PID desc
mapper.insert: insert into POST_INFO (TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, HRS_HD, VIEWS) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{author}, systimestamp, systimestamp, #{hrs_hd}, 0)
mapper.update: update POST_INFO set VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 where PID = #{pid}
update POST_INFO set TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, HRS_HD = #{hrs_hd}, MODIFIED_DATE = systimestamp where PID = #{pid}
